sentences.en: ...the conversion of disused rail lines into cycle routes.
sentences.cn: …把废弃的铁路改变成自行车道。

sentences.en: A loft conversion can add considerably to the value of a house.
sentences.cn: 将阁楼改造一下就可以使房子的价值大增。

sentences.en: Chemical carcinogens generally require metabolic conversion to some form of " ultimate " carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 化学致癌物一般需要通过代谢来转换成某种形式的 “ 最终 ” 致癌物.

sentences.en: Conversion of your heating system from coal to gas will be costly.
sentences.cn: 你把暖气系统由烧煤改造成烧瓦斯会花好多钱.

sentences.en: Currency-conversion costs remain one of the biggest obstacles to cross-border trade.
sentences.cn: 货币兑换成本仍是跨境贸易的最大障碍之一。

sentences.en: Indicating a conversion from analog information to digital form.
sentences.cn: 表示模拟信息到数字信息的转换.

sentences.en: It is always worth having a loft conversion costed out.
sentences.cn: 估算一下改建阁楼的费用总是很有必要的。

sentences.en: It is her uncle , the Bonze, who has found out about her conversion.
sentences.cn: 原来是她当和尚的叔叔, 发现了她叛教的事.

sentences.en: It's hard to trust the President's conversion.
sentences.cn: 总统信仰的改变让人难以相信。

sentences.en: The conversion of a procedure, a process, or equipment to automatic operation.
sentences.cn: 步骤 、 过程或设备向自动工作方式的转换.

sentences.en: the conversion of farm buildings into family homes
sentences.cn: 农场建筑物改建为家庭住宅

sentences.en: the conversion of waste into usable products
sentences.cn: 把废物变成可用的产品

sentences.en: The H conversion code provides a facility for printing out characters.
sentences.cn: H换算码为打印出字符提供方便.

sentences.en: These are the people who are doing our loft conversion for us.
sentences.cn: 就是这些人在为我们改造阁楼。

sentences.en: This consists of conversion of greasy wool into clean wool.
sentences.cn: 这是把含脂的羊毛变成干净的羊毛.

sentences.en: With methyl methacrylate the particle diameter increases linearly with conversion indicating particle aggregation.
sentences.cn: 采用甲基丙烯酸甲酯时,粒子直径随转化率呈直线增大,这就表明粒子发生了聚集.

words.tran_cn: 可改变的；同意义的；可交换的
逆行，逆向；倒；相反的事物
皈依者；改变宗教信仰者
可变换，可兑换；可改变性
转变；改变信仰（convert的过去式和过去分词形式）
转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰
使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰
转换；变换；[金融]兑换；改变信仰

phrases.tran_cn: 转化膜，转化层；机外涂布
换算因数；转换因子；变换因数
n. 光电转换；光电变换
n. 功率换算；能量变换

trans.tran_cn: 转变，转换，（信仰）改变，皈依，（橄榄球运动中的）附加得分
trans.tran_en: when you change something from one form, purpose, or system to a different one
